headline: What is an Integrated Email Security solution? And is it right for your organization?
keywords: Email Security, Cloud Email Security, Security
description: Gartner has named Area 1 Security as a Representative Vendor for IESS. We believe, Area 1 Security, as an IESS, provides the core functionalities of a SEG, but has the advantage of being very quick and easy to deploy, without requiring changes to the email flow at the gateway.
